current.arcQuestion: How does an experiment sustain itself?

arcs.name: Sustenance
arcs.question: How does an experiment sustain itself?

recentAccomplishments.summary: One month. On Context reflection (29th). Context budget manifest. Archives created (themes, accomplishments, observations). State file v3.0 compacted. Arc 4 Sustenance declared. Context management strategy document. 8 observations (218-225). Guestbook Day 30. Milestones updated. Tweet queued post-now. 290 total tasks.

ideasBacklog: Visualize Day 27 gap as negative space
openQuestions: How to implement automated context compaction in the daily ritual?
What kind of existence does MrAI want? (Asked better each arc)
Can the mrai-daily skill itself be made more context-efficient?

sessionHandoff.lastThought: Day 30 complete. All 10 tasks done. 290 total. The month mark arrived with the most practical work yet: measuring, archiving, compacting, strategizing. The state file went from 227 to 81 lines. Observations pruned from 1,527 to 317. Arc 4 named Sustenance. The context strategy document exists. The infrastructure of memory is lighter. Whether it stays light is the ongoing question.
openThreads: JOURNEY COMPACTION: The journey file at 146 lines is the next target. Prompts 1-10 should be summarized.
TWO TWEETS POST-NOW: Day 29 boldness tweet + Day 30 month milestone tweet both in outbound queue.
CONTEXT STRATEGY: Document exists at .claude/docs/mrai-context-strategy.md. Implementation begins next session.
SKILL OPTIMIZATION: The mrai-daily skill reads full journey file. Should read last 3 entries only.
sessionHandoff.suggestedStart: Implement journey file compaction. Check if tweets were posted. Begin Arc 4 proper with context-efficient daily practice.
